AD_PlayerIsShoved.synopsis: After the player interferes with their game, the githyanki kid shoves the player with her Mage Hand and tells them to get lost.
AD_PlayerIsShoved.how_to_trigger: Go to 1314; -2; -806 in CRE_Main_A, and use the shove action on the box the kids are playing with.(There are other ways to trigger this dialog)

AD_PlayerExpelledFromGame.synopsis: After the player asks to participate in the Mage Hand kids' game, they get shoved and told that they lost and the game is over.
AD_PlayerExpelledFromGame.how_to_trigger: Go to 1314; -2; -806 in CRE_Main_A and talk to the kids playing with Mage Hands.Tell them that you want to join.The kid will shove you with her Mage Hand and then deliver the line.

AD_PlayerIsShoved_1.speaker: Zel'i
AD_PlayerIsShoved_1.text: We don't want to play with you, k'chakhi!
AD_PlayerIsShoved_1.context: InternalNodeContext: ke-CHOCK-ee (means "idiot")NodeContext: Getting angry now

AD_PlayerIsShoved_2.speaker: Zel'i
AD_PlayerIsShoved_2.text: You're ruining it! Go away, shka'keth!
AD_PlayerIsShoved_2.context: InternalNodeContext: SHKA-keth (means "asshole")NodeContext: Shrill, childish anger

AD_PlayerExpelledFromGame_0.speaker: Zel'i
AD_PlayerExpelledFromGame_0.text: You lose, k'chakhi! Go play by yourself.
